name: part_005
file: tmp_【#常闇トワ生誕祭2022】MIX -私の存在証明- 【3DLIVE】 [KyURvb-eIU8]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_005.mov

scenes.description: Tokoyami Towa and Ayunda Risu perform the final section of 'ALICE&u'.
Visual transition with on-screen credits for the song 'FACT'.
Tokoyami Towa and Takane Lui perform the song 'FACT'.

subtitles.original: legacy
subtitles.english: legacy

subtitles.original: Let the wind, let the sea carry this melody
subtitles.english: Let the wind, let the sea carry this melody

subtitles.original: legacy
subtitles.english: legacy

subtitles.original: Timeless song that carry all the wish
subtitles.english: Timeless song that carry all the wish

subtitles.original: I believe
subtitles.english: I believe

subtitles.original:
All the words I could say right now,
I can only tell you a little bit
subtitles.english:
All the words I could say right now,
I can only tell you a little bit

subtitles.original:
Overwhelmingly too captivated to ever be able
to leave with every scene
subtitles.english:
Overwhelmingly too captivated to ever be able
to leave with every scene

subtitles.original:
Let the time send this sound to you,
I hope that you will sing it to me
subtitles.english:
Let the time send this sound to you,
I hope that you will sing it to me

subtitles.original: Lost of the melodies that I tried to love
subtitles.english: Lost of the melodies that I tried to love

subtitles.original: Everyday I will sing it aloud and I will try to shine
subtitles.english: Everyday I will sing it aloud and I will try to shine

subtitles.original: この声を聴いて
subtitles.english: Listen to this voice

subtitles.original: 足りない歌詞を足そう
subtitles.english: Let's add the missing lyrics

subtitles.original: Apa arti yang telah kuterima
subtitles.english: What is the meaning I have received

subtitles.original: Hati yang telah kupendam
subtitles.english: The heart I have kept inside

subtitles.original: A gentle breeze pass to your soul this time
subtitles.english: A gentle breeze pass to your soul this time

subtitles.original: Everything will be fine
subtitles.english: Everything will be fine

subtitles.original:
Everyday I will sing it aloud
this is my time to shine
subtitles.english:
Everyday I will sing it aloud
this is my time to shine

subtitles.original: 常闇の闇に囚われたまま
subtitles.english: Trapped in the darkness of the eternal night

subtitles.original: 奏でる悲鳴を
subtitles.english: The screams I play

subtitles.original: 聞かせて
subtitles.english: Let me hear them

subtitles.original: さぁ 爪を研いだら
subtitles.english: Now, once you've sharpened your claws

subtitles.original: まだ子供のようなあなたのために
subtitles.english: For you, who are still like a child

subtitles.original: あぁ 試されたいなら
subtitles.english: Ah, if you want to be tested

subtitles.original: その愚かな手に手錠をかけて
subtitles.english: Put handcuffs on those foolish hands

subtitles.original: 常闇の闇に囚われたまま
subtitles.english: Trapped in the darkness of the eternal night

subtitles.original: 甘い甘いガムを噛んでいた
subtitles.english: I was chewing sweet, sweet gum

subtitles.original: 幾つもの後悔を
subtitles.english: Countless regrets

subtitles.original: 捧げて
subtitles.english: Offer them up

subtitles.original: さりげない合図に隠れた
subtitles.english: Hidden in a casual signal

subtitles.original: 答えはすぐにわからせてあげる
subtitles.english: I'll let you know the answer soon

subtitles.original: 微笑な嘘にまみれた
subtitles.english: Covered in subtle lies

subtitles.original: 拒んだままに受け止めてあげる
subtitles.english: I'll accept you as you refuse

subtitles.original: ほら悲鳴を聞かせて
subtitles.english: Come on, let me hear the screams

subtitles.original: さぁ 指を鳴らしたら
subtitles.english: Now, once you've snapped your fingers

subtitles.original: この子猫のような私のために
subtitles.english: For me, who am like this kitten

subtitles.original: あら 喉が渇いたわ
subtitles.english: Oh, I'm thirsty

subtitles.original: 薄紅の口に指を散らして
subtitles.english: Scattering fingers on light crimson lips

subtitles.original: 狭い檻に閉じ込めたまま
subtitles.english: While locked in a narrow cage

subtitles.original: 首輪に繋がれたいのだ
subtitles.english: I want to be tied to a collar

subtitles.original: くだらないルールじゃ奪えない
subtitles.english: Can't be taken by trivial rules

subtitles.original: 自由はすでにこの手の中にある
subtitles.english: Freedom is already in these hands

subtitles.original: 愛情では計れない
subtitles.english: Can't be measured with affection

subtitles.original: 弱ったままに選ばせてあげる
subtitles.english: I'll let you choose while you're weak

subtitles.original: ほら心を開いて
subtitles.english: Come on, open your heart

subtitles.original: わからないふりをして
subtitles.english: Pretending not to know

subtitles.original: 寝惚けてるの？
subtitles.english: Are you half-asleep?

subtitles.original: もっと熱い暗闇を見せて
subtitles.english: Show me a hotter darkness

subtitles.original: ねぇ
subtitles.english: Hey

subtitles.original: さりげない合図に隠れた
subtitles.english: Hidden in a casual signal

subtitles.original: 答えはすぐにわからせてあげる
subtitles.english: I'll let you know the answer soon

subtitles.original: 微笑な嘘にまみれた
subtitles.english: Covered in subtle lies

subtitles.original: 拒んだままに受け止めてあげる
subtitles.english: I'll accept you as you refuse

subtitles.original: 常闇の闇に刻むこの名を
subtitles.english: Carving this name into the eternal darkness

subtitles.original: わからせてあげる
subtitles.english: I'll make you understand

subtitles.original: ほら悲鳴を聞かせてよ
subtitles.english: Come on, let me hear the screams

subtitles.original: 夢見ないで
subtitles.english: Don't dream
